ygData.subject: Perhaps a Gladiator fanfic?
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as I know, up till now no-one has written a Gladiator fanfic. It seems to me that that would be a really interesting project... I just finished a story

Subject: Perhaps a Gladiator fanfic?

From: "-Tevildo." <Tevildo@...>

As far as I know, up till now no-one has written a Gladiator fanfic. It 
seems to me that that would be a really interesting project... I just 
finished a story involving my character in the Two Towers LPMud 
(http://angband.com/towers), and sometime next week I'll start writing a 
story with Torvald (levels 5 and 6) and Neldwyn (level 6) from the original 
Gladiator scenarios. If several people wrote Gladiator stories, I doubt 
there would be a problem with posting them on the Gladiator page at Onelist. 
I'm perfectly willing to post other people's stuff on my levels download 
page (http://hotyellow98.com/tevildo/glad.html), too... scenarios, art, 
whatever.

I just ask that no-one else use Torvald and Neldwyn as characters, at least 
until I finish my story. That way I won't get any extraneous influences from 
other people's writing. Talk to you later.
           -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.

Hmm, speaking of the Two Towers, I've been making webpages for a player 
group from there... I'd appreciate any hits and guestbook signings. Sorry 
for the plugs, and thanks a lot. 
(http://members.internettrash.com/smokers_guild or 
http://welcome.to/smokers_guild)
